title: Practice with Expected Value Tables
body: Suppose you play a game with a spinner. You play each game by spinning the spinner once. $$P(red)=\frac{2}{5}$$, $$P(blue)=\frac{2}{5}$$, and $$P(green)=\frac{1}{5}$$. If you land on red, you pay $10. If you land on blue, you don't pay or win anything. If you land on green, you win $10. We want to find how much we expect to earn in the process. Let's complete the expected value table provided.\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 4.2 Mean or Expected Value and Standard Deviation
